label: 主税寮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Also chikara no tsukasa.  A bureau within the Popular Affairs Ministry (Minbushō), which controlled the agricultural produce tax (so) and receipts and disbursements from government granraries in the provinces (p. 810). [民部省、租]
